commit message:
Remove paddingStart/paddingEnd until Samsung gets around to fixing this crash. :-(

https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=60055

Temporarily remove seed/desc, which are completely broken.

(configOK() is wrong, they need handling differently)

Shows how many people use them...

Be even more cautious with bitmap size for #195.

Seems some people still have texture limit 2048 even at >= ICS, and some are getting OOMs. So only go to 4096 if screen > 2048.

Bump version to release this.

See also #199.
